newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Agie Charmilles says all options exercised.
newsitem.headline: Agie Charmilles says all options exercised.

text.p: Agie Charmilles Holding AG said all of the free options issued to shareholders in January had been exercised, thus creating 876,562 new registered shares worth 74.5 million.

Income from the options will boost group equity and help repay a 60.5 million franc loan from Georg Fischer AG last year related to the takeover of Charmilles. Two options entitled the holder to buy one 20-franc-par share for 85 francs.
The company's share capital now totals 97.7 million francs, comprising nearly 4.9 million registered shares. Agie shares were trading at 153.75, up 4.75. -- Zurich +41 1 631 7340
